results.content:
Simply awesome!
Great instructor with fantastic content - to the point presented in a well structured manner using good pace.
I use Sales force, so am comfortable with most of the areas talked about, but there were several techniques that I did not know! and learned from this course.
Excellent experience with this course. Thank you to all for providing this course.
